name: winey
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having the flavour, colour, smell, or qualities of wine: A sour, winey smell clung to his skin and hair. The coffee bean is produced in Indonesia and has a rich, winey flavour. It's a mild blue cheese, with a winy taste to it.
More examplesFewer examplesThis coffee is more winey and acidic than I am used to drinking. The jewellery box was lined with winey red velvet. The pork was cooked with mushrooms in a winy cream sauce.The syrup is dark, with a winy fragrance.
